case.title: Far Eastern Beauty Alone Tonight - 23 (Midtown East)
case.text: It's a little after 10, and I'd like to find some company relatively soon. I'm fairly discerning. Send a photo (or detailed physical description), your age, and general location. Replies with a few recent pictures proving it's really you get first responses. I'm younger and prefer guy in their 30s or 40s because I like to be really spoiled. I have no problem traveling to you and leaving you with the sweetest dreams. No endless emails. :)
